entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API mediapicker to take photo without user tap on take photo button #22723
  • Connect To Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object #22722
  • Sporadic InterOp.Com exception when retrieving a stored settting with Preferences.Get #22720
  • FlyoutPage.Flyout - navigation corrupted when running om mac , on window ok #22719
  • .NET 9 - Raise Min iOS supported version #22718
    9.0-preview7
  • Controls slide up when using the keyboard in iOS #22715
  • [XamlC] Produce warning when Binding inside of DataTemplate inherits x:DataType from outside of the template #22714
  • SwipeView erroneusly triggers SelectionChangedCommand in CollectionView on swiping gesture. (Was not the case with Xamarin.Forms) #22711
  • when navigate between pages (using Navigation.PushAsync and Shell.Current.GoToAsync("//Home") ) #22709
  • Image File Size Increases Excessively Upon Saving on iOS Platform #22708
  • Add Translucent Status Bar Setter to Community Toolkit #22706
  • Scanner is not working with iOS Maui. #22705
  • Unable to Login with Social Media like Facebook #22704
  • Unable to set alternate app icons in maui Android!! #22703
  • Maui.Controls.Compatibility.StackLayout; add children, chidlren.clear, re-add children -> System.ArgumentNullException: 'Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'view') #22702
  • Picker not opening when calling Focus() in .NET MAUI #22701
  • IsEnabled=False in RefreshView is inherited by child controls. (Was not the case with Xamarin) #22699
  • [Windows] WebView2 not handling DOM events properly #22697
  • Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.IImage Downsize function rotates images in Android only #22696
  • [MAUI]When the edit content fills the edit box, the latest input content is not displayed #22695

Closed

  • Error building the tutorial app #22692
  • Further expand on button tests #22433
    .NET 8 SR6
  • IllegalArgumentException .NET MAUI 8 RC 2 #18251
    .NET 8 SR6
  • AppStore publishing - AppIcon missing #22421

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource - fix #22726
    community ✨
  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22713
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22712
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    community ✨

Merged

  • [XC] Fix loading non-compiled ResourceDictionary #22664
    area-xaml
  • [ci] Fix rev for version #22716
  • We don't need System.Drawing #22707
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, platform/tizen
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
    area-testing, area-controls-button
  • [XC] Compile TemplateBindingExtension #22008
    area-xaml
  • Fix the tests in VS #22700
  • [ci] Update Maestro.targets #22689
    area-infrastructure
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area-drawing
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
